highlights.chapter: Many businesses act unethically and make plans to get away with it
highlights.quote: Dishonest practices like this got many workers into trouble, even though they were simply following orders from their superiors
highlights.note: So do you follow bad orders, or do you get fired?

highlights.chapter: Sometimes businesses act for the greater good to fight greed
